name: la depresso enchante
description:
This is an old "art game" I was fiddling around with and I recently decided to finally let it go and publish it. 

This is not really a game and not a drawing tool. There is no goal. You could call it overly complex wallpaper maker :D

Also: Name is what it is because I called it that many years ago. No idea why, but could not figure out better options so...

Some controls:

You can toggle the settings with mouse and scroll or with arrow keys.
Enter starts the "game" with those settings.

Escape returns to the menu or exits the game if in menu.

In the "game" you can use keyboard and mouse. Lot of the buttons do different things. I think you should try something, and if you like how it looks, keep doing it. Game also evolves on its own so sometimes it is better to just sit back and watch.
